bike.description: 6011 hydroformed butted aluminum mainframe & chainstays, TopSwing magnesium link, semi-integrated internally relieved E2 1-1/8"-1-1/2" HT design, cold-forged dropouts, G2 Geometry

components.description: Fox Float 140RL, 140mm travel, E2 tapered 1-1/8"-1-1/2" alloy steerer, custom G2 Geometry 46mm offset crown, air spring, lockout, external rebound, new magnesium lowers with QR15 thru-axle system, post style disc brake mount
Shimano M525 w/M570 (LX) freehub/QR15 cartridge bearing sealed front hub, Bontrager Duster tubeless ready* 28mm wide disc rims, 32h
Bontrager Race, 2014 alloy shaft, two-bolt rocker head
Bontrager Race OS Riser, 40mm rise, 690mm width, 7d backsweep, 4d upsweep, 31.8mm
Custom E2 1-1/8"-1-1/2" threadless, semi-integrated, semi-cartridge bearings
Avid Juicy 3, hydraulic disc, 185mm front/160mm rear G2 Clean Sweep 6-bolt rotors
